entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming south 20 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
